item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 15, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
item.description:

6. Carma (YC W24) Is Hiring Software Engineers to Get Fleets Same-Day Auto Repair ( | hide)
7. After 155 years, the Campbell Soup company is changing its name (13 points | 10 comments)
